Class DateUtil

java.lang.Object
com.pekings.pos.util.DateUtil
public class DateUtil extends Object
Utility class for handling common date and time operations. Provides methods for parsing, manipulating, and obtaining specific date and time values.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Date
    addDay(Date date)
    Adds one day to the given Date.

    endOfData()
    Provides the ending instant for the application data range (December 31, 2024).

    Parses a string into a Date object using the format "yyyy-MM-dd".

    Provides the starting instant for the application data range (January 1, 2024).

      public DateUtil()

  • Method Details

    • fromString

      public static Date fromString(String s)
      Parses a string into a Date object using the format "yyyy-MM-dd".
      Parameters:
      s - The date string to parse.
      Returns:
      A Date object representing the parsed date, or null if parsing fails.

    • addDay

      public static Date addDay(Date date)
      Adds one day to the given Date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to which a day will be added.
      Returns:
      A new Date object representing the next day.

    • startOfData

      public static Instant startOfData()
      Provides the starting instant for the application data range (January 1, 2024).
      Returns:
      An Instant representing the start of the data range.

    • endOfData

      public static Instant endOfData()
      Provides the ending instant for the application data range (December 31, 2024).
      Returns:
      An Instant representing the end of the data range.

    • startOfDay

      public static Instant startOfDay(Instant instant)
      Computes the start of the day (midnight) for a given instant.
      Parameters:
      instant - The Instant for which the start of the day is calculated.
      Returns:
      An Instant representing the start of the day (midnight).
